data.name: A Warmer Shade of Summer Fan Pack
data.detailed_description:
Become A Fan today! So I Can Eat tomorrow.

Note


This DLC exists as a pay-as-you-like method. We had always planned to distribute the game for free, but if you feel like the experience was worth paying for feel free to purchase or ignore this DLC as it contains no additional content.
